high_consensus.description: Add S2S timeout, retry/backoff, and circuit breaker acceptance criteria to prevent cascading failures
Add NATS chaos test (kill NATS), verify header fallback, define reconciliation SLAs for usage reporting reliability
Add zero-downtime migration guidelines (expand/contract, additive-only, deploy-order independence) to Sprint 1 migrations
Add explicit end-to-end billing integration test plan with precision/rounding assertions and idempotency checks across payment→mint→reservation→balance path

blockers.concern: Schedule math and staffing internally inconsistent (14 days, 1 engineer, many L tasks, sequential dependency chain)
Key management/rotation partially specified; bootstrap scripts + Secrets Manager can create unrecoverable auth outages
Streaming usage accounting fragile: X-Token-Count / SSE done event unreliable across model pools and disconnects
Web widget security gaps: XSS/supply-chain risk for widget.js, CSRF/session fixation, WebSocket auth/origin enforcement
NATS JetStream + EFS mid-plan is hidden complexity and major operational risk for 1-engineer launch
Cloud Map + service discovery assumptions may fail in existing VPC/ECS setup
NOWPayments IPN authenticity, replay behavior, and operational failure modes may break state machine
